org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop
类 ViewSourcePane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop.ViewSourcePane
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ViewSourcePane
extends javax.swing.JPanel

ViewSourcePane allow viewing of some text in its own standalone frame. The text to be viewed can be grabbed from a String, a URI, or a file.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com], DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格
